name: [AA] Military Police
description:
Alpha Authority Military Police; a highly strict and skilled branch specialised in law enforcement, problem solving, specialist military combat and hostile detainment. Military Police are available to solve problems that arise within the group, as well as proving a specialised combat force upon deployment.
